item.description:
What better way to enjoy Super Bowl Sunday than eating and bowling while watching the game on the gigantic screens!

First we'll socialize over food and drinks at the Blue Dog Sports Bar & Grille and then will go over to the bowling area and bowl for only $14 per person, unlimited bowling all night long (including shoes). You do not have to bowl to hang out with us! Just come and have some fun!

Food & Drinks: 4 pm at the Blue Dog Sports Bar & Grille

Bowling and watching the Game: 6:30 pm - on

Hope to see you there!
item.name: Super Bowl Party at PINZ
